member.name: T:CasparObjects.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.My.Resources.Resources.CasparProxy
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: T:CasparObjects.CasparCG
member.summary: CasparCG connection object

member.name: T:CasparObjects.CasparCG.MediaTypes
member.summary: Media clip types

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.MediaTypes.All
member.summary: All media types

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.MediaTypes.Movie
member.summary: Only videos

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.MediaTypes.Still
member.summary: Only still pictures

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.MediaTypes.Audio
member.summary: Only audio clips

member.name: T:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult
member.summary: Return Value of the Connect function

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult.crSuccessfull
member.summary: Succesfully connected to CasparCG

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult.crMachineNotAvailable
member.summary: The machine could not be pinged, network error or machine is not running

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult.crCasparCGNotStarted
member.summary: CasparCG does not respond, it is not started on the machine

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult.crLocalCasparCGCouldNotBeStarted
member.summary: A local CasprCG server could not be loaded using the CasparExePath property

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumConnectResult.crIsNotLocal
member.summary: This is not a local CasparCG and could not be started using the CasparExePath argument

member.name: T:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumAddInfoFieldsType
member.summary: The way channel and layer informations get added to template data.

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumAddInfoFieldsType.itNone
member.summary: No channel and layer informations were added.

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumAddInfoFieldsType.itStandard
member.summary: The standard "channel" and "layer" variable names are used.

member.name: F:CasparObjects.CasparCG.enumAddInfoFieldsType.itAveco
member.summary: The Aveco automation specific variable names "astra_output" and "astra_layer" are used.

member.name: T:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Retard
member.summary: Class for use with delayed execution.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Name
member.summary: The name of the CasparCG Server instance

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Port
member.summary: The port number to connect to

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.DefaultChannel
member.summary: The default channel to output in

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.DefaultLayer
member.summary: The default layer to output on

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.KeepQuiet
member.summary: Inhibits exeptions on connection errors

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.CasparExePath
member.summary: Full qualified path to Caspar's exe file. Must be local to the client.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Retries
member.summary: Number of retries for a connection, before giving up.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.ServerAdress
member.summary: IP-Address or computer name to connect to Caspar

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.FormatTextsForHTML
member.summary: True to replace backslashes, single and double quotes for HTML.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.DisableWebSecurity
member.summary: True to start the server with the DisableWebSecurity flag set.

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.IsLocal
member.summary: If Caspar is on the local machine
member.returns: True if local, false if remote

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.LocalPictureFolder
member.summary: Points to a folder were pictres are stored
member.remarks: The path is local to the server

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.RemotePictureFolder
member.summary: Points to a folder were pictres are stored
member.remarks: The path is a network share seen from the client

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.ChannelFilterList
member.summary: Set Channel-filter for the ExecuteFiltered function
member.remarks: A space separated list of allowed channels

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Connected
member.summary: Indicate connection status

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.Version
member.summary: Query the version of CasparCG server as a VersionInfo object

member.name: P:CasparObjects.CasparCG.VersionSerialized
member.summary: Query the version of CasparCG server as a serialized integer: Version.Major * 1000000 + Version.Minor * 10000 + Version.Revision

member.summary: Adds the template in Caspar

member.name: M:CasparObjects.CasparCG.WriteCasparConfig(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Write a caspar.config file based on a template
member.param: Template file to use. {paths} will be replaced by the paths to the assets, {videomode} will be replased with the 1080i and the current framerate.
Path to the CasparCG exe file
Base path for all assets. If the folders do not exist, they will be created.
Optional, videomode string for PAL countries
Optional, videomode string for NTSC countries
